com.esri.mo2.map.core
Interface DropshadowLayer

All Superinterfaces:
Cloneable
All Known Implementing Classes:
BaseDropshadowLayer
public interface DropshadowLayer
extends Cloneable

This interface defines the APIs for an element's drop shadow layer. One important note is that the envelope defined here is relative to the element it associated with, not the coordinate system the element uses.

Method Summary
 Object clone()
          Clones the current element background
 void draw(Graphics2D g)
          Draw element's BorderLayer on the given graphic context
 void draw(Graphics2D g, Rectangle rec)
          Prints this element drop shadow using the bounding box info and graphics handle from a printer.
 Element getElement()
          Gets the Element associated with this border
 Point2D getLayerLocation()
          Gets drop shadow layer's location without applying the off sets
 Dimension2D getLayerSize()
          Gets drop shadow's size that equals the element's size minus/plus the border's gaps
 Paint getOutlinePaint()
          Gets Element's drop shadow outline paint/color
 BasicStroke getOutlineStroke()
          Gets Element's drop shadow outline stroke
